resources.string:
Thanks to everyone who has donated Your support is appreciated and helps support the app.
 See http://www.cadpage.org/financial-support for more details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 The new Config Widget has been Updated (less crashing) ! Long Press on an empty part of your home screen to add the new 1x4 widget.
 Instructions on use are on the webpage under UserManual and on the Facebook Page.
 MMS Support is here!!!
 This is highly experimental. Your mileage may vary. See http://www.cadpage.org/faq/mms-message-support for details
 
 16 New Locations:
 Bulloch County, GA 
 Nassau County, NY (alternate)
 Henry County, AL
 Delaware County, PA (alternate)
 Wight County, VA
 Halifax County, VA
 Davie County, NC
 Port Jefferson, NY (In Suffolk County)
 Snyder County, PA
 Sussex County, NJ
 Jefferson City, MO
 Union County, TN
 Orange County, NC
 Shelby County, OH
 Durham County, NC
 Watauga County, NC
 
 Multiple Fixes for Existing Locations and Issues
